TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DoubleType extends System.Object

summary.span: 从 Visual Basic 2005 开始，此类已被否决。

span.span: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供用于操作可能表示的数据的方法`Double`值。This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Double` value.

summary.span: 返回与指定的对象以及可选的数字格式信息相对应的 值。

span.span: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified object and optional number format information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持 Visual Basic 编译器，不宜在代码中直接使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
